name: CategoryTheory.Paths.induction_fixed_source
initialProofState:
V : Type uâ‚
instâœ : Quiver V
a : CategoryTheory.Paths V
P : {b : CategoryTheory.Paths V} â†’ Quiver.Hom a b â†’ Prop
id : P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id a)
comp : âˆ€ {u v : V} (p : Quiver.Hom a (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj u)) (q : Quiver.Hom u v), P p â†’ P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp p (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.map q))
b : CategoryTheory.Paths V
f : Quiver.Hom a b
âŠ¢ P f
decl:
/-- To prove a property on morphisms of a path category with given source `a`, it suffices to
prove it for the identity and prove that the property is preserved under composition on the right
with length 1 paths. -/
lemma induction_fixed_source {a : Paths V} (P : âˆ€ {b : Paths V}, (a âŸ¶ b) â†’ Prop)
    (id : P (ðŸ™ a))
    (comp : âˆ€ {u v : V} (p : a âŸ¶ of.obj u) (q : u âŸ¶ v), P p â†’ P (p â‰« of.map q)) :
    âˆ€ {b : Paths V} (f : a âŸ¶ b), P f := by
  intro _ f
  induction f with
  | nil => exact id
  | cons _ w h => exact comp _ w h

name: CategoryTheory.Paths.induction_fixed_target
initialProofState:
V : Type uâ‚
instâœ : Quiver V
b : CategoryTheory.Paths V
P : {a : CategoryTheory.Paths V} â†’ Quiver.Hom a b â†’ Prop
id : P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id b)
comp : âˆ€ {u v : V} (p : Quiver.Hom (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj v) b) (q : Quiver.Hom u v), P p â†’ P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.map q) p)
a : CategoryTheory.Paths V
f : Quiver.Hom a b
âŠ¢ P f
decl:
/-- To prove a property on morphisms of a path category with given target `b`, it suffices to prove
it for the identity and prove that the property is preserved under composition on the left
with length 1 paths. -/
lemma induction_fixed_target {b : Paths V} (P : âˆ€ {a : Paths V}, (a âŸ¶ b) â†’ Prop)
    (id : P (ðŸ™ b))
    (comp : âˆ€ {u v : V} (p : of.obj v âŸ¶ b) (q : u âŸ¶ v), P p â†’ P (of.map q â‰« p)) :
    âˆ€ {a : Paths V} (f : a âŸ¶ b), P f := by
  intro a f
  generalize h : f.length = k
  induction k generalizing f a with
  | zero => cases f with
    | nil => exact id
    | cons _ _ => simp at h
  | succ k h' =>
    obtain âŸ¨c, f, q, hq, rflâŸ© := f.eq_toPath_comp_of_length_eq_succ h
    exact comp _ _ (h' _ hq)

name: CategoryTheory.Paths.induction
initialProofState:
V : Type uâ‚
instâœ : Quiver V
P : {a b : CategoryTheory.Paths V} â†’ Quiver.Hom a b â†’ Prop
id : âˆ€ {v : V}, P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj v))
comp : âˆ€ {u v w : V} (p : Quiver.Hom (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj u) (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj v)) (q : Quiver.Hom v w), P p â†’ P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp p (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.map q))
a b : CategoryTheory.Paths V
f : Quiver.Hom a b
âŠ¢ P f
decl:
/-- To prove a property on morphisms of a path category, it suffices to prove it for the identity
and prove that the property is preserved under composition on the right with length 1 paths. -/
lemma induction (P : âˆ€ {a b : Paths V}, (a âŸ¶ b) â†’ Prop)
    (id : âˆ€ {v : V}, P (ðŸ™ (of.obj v)))
    (comp : âˆ€ {u v w : V} (p : of.obj u âŸ¶ of.obj v) (q : v âŸ¶ w), P p â†’ P (p â‰« of.map q)) :
    âˆ€ {a b : Paths V} (f : a âŸ¶ b), P f :=
  fun {_} â†¦ induction_fixed_source _ id comp

name: CategoryTheory.Paths.induction'
initialProofState:
V : Type uâ‚
instâœ : Quiver V
P : {a b : CategoryTheory.Paths V} â†’ Quiver.Hom a b â†’ Prop
id : âˆ€ {v : V}, P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.id (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj v))
comp : âˆ€ {u v w : V} (p : Quiver.Hom u v) (q : Quiver.Hom (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj v) (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.obj w)), P q â†’ P (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.map p) q)
a b : CategoryTheory.Paths V
f : Quiver.Hom a b
âŠ¢ P f
decl:
/-- To prove a property on morphisms of a path category, it suffices to prove it for the identity
and prove that the property is preserved under composition on the left with length 1 paths. -/
lemma induction' (P : âˆ€ {a b : Paths V}, (a âŸ¶ b) â†’ Prop)
    (id : âˆ€ {v : V}, P (ðŸ™ (of.obj v)))
    (comp : âˆ€ {u v w : V} (p : u âŸ¶ v) (q : of.obj v âŸ¶ of.obj w), P q â†’ P (of.map p â‰« q)) :
    âˆ€ {a b : Paths V} (f : a âŸ¶ b), P f := by
  intro a b
  revert a
  exact induction_fixed_target (P := fun f â†¦ P f) id (fun _ _ â†¦ comp _ _)

name: CategoryTheory.Paths.lift_unique
initialProofState:
V : Type uâ‚
instâœÂ¹ : Quiver V
C : Type u_1
instâœ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
Ï† : Prefunctor V C
Î¦ : CategoryTheory.Functor (CategoryTheory.Paths V) C
hÎ¦ : Eq (CategoryTheory.Paths.of.comp Î¦.toPrefunctor) Ï†
âŠ¢ Eq Î¦ (CategoryTheory.Paths.lift Ï†)
decl:
theorem lift_unique {C} [Category C] (Ï† : V â¥¤q C) (Î¦ : Paths V â¥¤ C)
    (hÎ¦ : of â‹™q Î¦.toPrefunctor = Ï†) : Î¦ = lift Ï† := by
  subst_vars
  fapply Functor.ext
  Â· rintro X
    rfl
  Â· rintro X Y f
    dsimp [lift]
    induction f with
    | nil =>
      simp only [Category.comp_id]
      apply Functor.map_id
    | cons p f' ih =>
      simp only [Category.comp_id, Category.id_comp] at ih âŠ¢
      -- Porting note: Had to do substitute `p.cons f'` and `f'.toPath` by their fully qualified
      -- versions in this `have` clause (elsewhere too).
      have : Î¦.map (Quiver.Path.cons p f') = Î¦.map p â‰« Î¦.map (Quiver.Hom.toPath f') := by
        convert Functor.map_comp Î¦ p (Quiver.Hom.toPath f')
      rw [this, ih]

name: CategoryTheory.Paths.ext_functor
initialProofState:
V : Type uâ‚
instâœÂ¹ : Quiver V
C : Type u_1
instâœ : CategoryTheory.Category.{u_2, u_1} C
F G : CategoryTheory.Functor (CategoryTheory.Paths V) C
h_obj : Eq F.obj G.obj
h : âˆ€ (a b : V) (e : Quiver.Hom a b), Eq (F.map e.toPath) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (CategoryTheory.eqToHom â‹¯) (CategoryTheory.CategoryStruct.comp (G.map e.toPath) (CategoryTheory.eqToHom â‹¯)))
âŠ¢ Eq F G
decl:
/-- Two functors out of a path category are equal when they agree on singleton paths. -/
@[ext (iff := false)]
theorem ext_functor {C} [Category C] {F G : Paths V â¥¤ C} (h_obj : F.obj = G.obj)
    (h : âˆ€ (a b : V) (e : a âŸ¶ b), F.map e.toPath =
        eqToHom (congr_fun h_obj a) â‰« G.map e.toPath â‰« eqToHom (congr_fun h_obj.symm b)) :
    F = G := by
  fapply Functor.ext
  Â· intro X
    rw [h_obj]
  Â· intro X Y f
    induction' f with Y' Z' g e ih
    Â· erw [F.map_id, G.map_id, Category.id_comp, eqToHom_trans, eqToHom_refl]
    Â· erw [F.map_comp g (Quiver.Hom.toPath e), G.map_comp g (Quiver.Hom.toPath e), ih, h]
      simp only [Category.id_comp, eqToHom_refl, eqToHom_trans_assoc, Category.assoc]

name: CategoryTheory.pathComposition_obj
initialProofState:
C : Type uâ‚
instâœ : CategoryTheory.Category.{vâ‚, uâ‚} C
X : CategoryTheory.Paths C
âŠ¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.pathComposition C).obj X) X
decl:
/-- Composition of paths as functor from the path category of a category to the category. -/
@[simps]
def pathComposition : Paths C â¥¤ C where
  obj X := X
  map f := composePath f

-- TODO: This, and what follows, should be generalized to
-- the `HomRel` for the kernel of any functor.
-- Indeed, this should be part of an equivalence between congruence relations on a category `C`
-- and full, essentially surjective functors out of `C`.

/-- Composition of paths as functor from the path category of a category to the category. -/
@[simps]
def pathComposition : Paths C â¥¤ C where
  obj X := X

-- TODO: This, and what follows, should be generalized to

name: CategoryTheory.toQuotientPaths_obj_as
initialProofState:
C : Type uâ‚
instâœ : CategoryTheory.Category.{vâ‚, uâ‚} C
X : C
âŠ¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.toQuotientPaths C).obj X).as X
decl:
/-- The functor from a category to the canonical quotient of its path category. -/
@[simps]
def toQuotientPaths : C â¥¤ Quotient (pathsHomRel C) where
  obj X := Quotient.mk X
  map f := Quot.mk _ f.toPath
  map_id X := Quot.sound (Quotient.CompClosure.of _ _ _ (by simp))
  map_comp f g := Quot.sound (Quotient.CompClosure.of _ _ _ (by simp))

decl:
/-- The functor from a category to the canonical quotient of its path category. -/
@[simps]
def toQuotientPaths : C â¥¤ Quotient (pathsHomRel C) where

name: CategoryTheory.quotientPathsTo_map
initialProofState:
C : Type uâ‚
instâœ : CategoryTheory.Category.{vâ‚, uâ‚} C
a b : CategoryTheory.Quotient (CategoryTheory.pathsHomRel C)
hf : Quiver.Hom a b
âŠ¢ Eq ((CategoryTheory.quotientPathsTo C).map hf) (Quot.liftOn hf (fun f => CategoryTheory.composePath f) â‹¯)
decl:
/-- The functor from the canonical quotient of a path category of a category
to the original category. -/
@[simps!]
def quotientPathsTo : Quotient (pathsHomRel C) â¥¤ C :=
  Quotient.lift _ (pathComposition C) fun _ _ _ _ w => w
